attributes.action: raise the speed limit on UK motorways to 100MPH
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current speed limit is hopelessly out of date; it was set back in the 1960’s based on the safety, performance and capability of vehicles manufactured then. Over 40 years ago. But, automotive design and technology has come a long way since then. Even the cheapest modern cars are far more capable than the best made 40 years ago. Therefore, the speed limit should be raised to a limit that would be reasonable today, in modern Britain, that being 100 MPH.
